example.eg: Contact with wet paint can ruin your clothes.
example.egtrans: 碰到没干的油漆，你的衣服就毁了。

example.eg: Does he have any contact with the Mexican community?
example.egtrans: 他与墨西哥社区有任何联系吗？

example.eg: Yes, we were friends, but we have lost contact in the last few years.
example.egtrans: 是的，我们曾是朋友，不过已经好几年没有联系对方了。

example.eg: I have a contact in that company if you need any help.
example.egtrans: 如果您需要帮助，我在那家公司有熟人。

example.eg: Bree has striking eyes, but the truth is that she wears green contacts.
example.egtrans: 布里的眼睛很迷人，不过真相是她戴了绿色的隐形眼镜。

example.eg: You should contact your doctor if you get a high fever.
example.egtrans: 如果发高烧，应该与医生联系。

example.eg: Contact paper is sticky on both sides.
The electrical contacts must touch to complete the circuit.
example.egtrans: 电触点必须接触才能接通电路。

example.eg: Do you know how Steve's doing these days? Are you two still in contact?

trans_examp.trans_cn: 保持联系, 时常联系

example.eg: The man suspected of the bombing attack had been in contact with a foreign terrorist organization.
I develop a rash if my skin is in contact with nickel for too long.

dsense.name: come in contact with [sth], come into contact with [sth]

example.eg: I phoned the doctor as soon as I found out I had come in contact with someone who had Swine Flu.

dsense.name: come in contact with [sb], come into contact with [sb]

example.eg: Poison ivy, poison oak and sumac can all cause contact dermatitis.
Please include all your contact details on your cover letter.
I gave my contact information when I left a message with the secretary.

dsense.name: contact lens, lens
dsense.guideword: usually plural (corrective lenses worn in the eyes)

example.eg: Marc is wearing glasses today because he lost a contact lens.
Please leave your contact number so that we can contact you as soon as possible.
Rugby and football are high-contact sports.
Eye contact is important when communicating with others.
example.egtrans: 与人交谈时，眼神交流很重要。

example.eg: You can get in contact with us at the address above.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 开始与…接触, 与…建立联系

dsense.name: keep in contact, stay in contact

example.eg: My uncle and I stayed in contact after he moved to Australia.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 保持联系, 保持联络

dsense.name: keep in contact with [sb], stay in contact with [sb]

example.eg: New technologies make it easy to keep in contact with your customers.  I'm sorry you have to leave but please keep in contact.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 保持联系, 保持联络

example.eg: Perhaps one day aliens will make contact with the Earth.
People who are lying often avoid making eye contact.
A person with telekinetic powers can move an object without ever making physical contact with it.
